subject: Le Mans Auto Race
Automobile Racing
Electric and Hybrid Vehicles
lead_paragraph: The 24 Hours of Le Mans is normally thought of as a test of endurance, but the pursuit of high-tech advantage is the key to the race. This year, two teams are using hybrid systems that get a big boost from braking.
